long_description: The versatile Dankso Sonnet Nubuck Sandals will take you from day to night with modern styling and all-day comfort. Sandals feature pillow-soft, contoured footbeds and a lightweight construction for all-day comfort. Dri-lex(R)-wrapped footbeds provide moisture management. Beveled heels offer great stability at impact. Shock-absorbing foam midsole provides all-day comfort; nylon shanks are built-in for added support and stability. EVA insert provides gives you cushioning where you need it most. Long-wearing durable, polyurethane outsoles provide shock absorption, flexibility and energy return. The Dankso Sonnet Nubuck Sandals carry the Seal of Acceptance from the APMA (American Podiatric Medical Association).
short_description: The versatile Dankso Sonnet Nubuck Sandals will take you from day to night with modern styling and all-day comfort.
